UpdateInfo.Name: Tray Radio
UpdateInfo.Changes: - Connected with Appveyor. - Removed unused NuGet packages. - Added new RecordFileStream class. This is for future ID3 tagging support. - Changed default records base folder from application location to Environment.SpecialFolder.CommonApplicationData, which means "C:\ProgramData" on Windows 7/8/10 and "C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data" on Windows XP. - Added own SearchDirectory function in case of UnauthorizedAccessException. - Show recording icons fix. - Recording file now opens with mode FileMode.Create instead of FileMode.CreateNew. - Added new buttons to change folder for records to default value and for opening it.
